Angelo Rosace

31 . 12 . 1996

Italian based in Barcelona

Freelance Illustrator

Master student in Bioinformatics for Health Science

Hi, I am Angelo, just another illustrator.

I am italian but I currently live in Barcelona.

I am a full time Bioinformatics Student and a freelance illustrator.
